interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Review Date: 2017/10/22
Average Rating: 4.1
Product Details: {'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Xavier Gens'], 'Producers': ['Peter Safran'], 'Starring': ['Sophie Cookson', 'Corneliu Ulici', 'Brittany Ashworth'], 'Studio': ['Lionsgate']}
Review Text: beautiful shots, excellent grading and lighting... cheap jump scares... don't really care what happens to any of the characters because the storytelling is lacking in that department. It's an okay thing to have playing in the background during parties
Review Title: transformers movie but in horror genre
Rating: 3.0
--------------------------------------------------
